## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b9bbc46888ec54d0f044dbb94a3b9d6dfd27c7279fcfd31387eb82580eaa972c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'galaktika-components' @ 0.1.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
